name: Mazlow
slogan: Mazlow, your financial tool, and mentor in the palm of your hand!
description:
Mazlow is a 360 holistic financial brand who is approaching finance differently. It is an app based platform encouraging financial well-being.

We are all about improving our customers wellbeing, educating them in various areas and providing tools within the app to help improve their life.

jobs.title: Tech Lead for Fintech Start Up!
jobs.description:
The most disruptive 360 Fintech company based in Knightsbridge London is looking for a dynamic Full-stack teach lead who's willing to take the challenge!!

About The Role 

Experienced with JavaScript, MongoDB and Node JS, Plus IOS Swift, AWS/Amazon.

We're looking for a Tech Lead to join a small, genuinely world-class team building a revolutionary mobile banking/well-being app that is going to simplify people's lives and make it easier!!

What You'll Be Doing 

* Leading the ongoing of the App development.
* Defining and implementing an IT strategy that underpins our overall business strategy
* Creating and maintaining IT & IS policies
* Setting up, managing and enhancing the business IT procedures and controls
* Delivering robust IS procedures and controls
* Develop, test and optimise a Business Continuity Plan 
* Working closely with our Banking Partner, Compliance & Legal teams to prioritise compliance and implementation 
* Knowledge of PCI compliance is needed but not mandatory 

What You’ll Need 
* Experience in developing a banking app and implementing FX and banking API’s 
* Experience in setting up, managing and enhancing IT & IS controls in large organisations
* Knowledge and experience in Retail Banking Products and knowledge of relevant regulations
* Preferably you will have some start-up experience, Great project management skills
* Excellent writing skills (business and project reports), good presenter & communicator
* Ability to prioritise workload in line with tight deadlines and work effectively under pressure
* Excellent team player with the ability to work closely with others to deliver results
* Demonstrate an ability to think and reason logically

What We Are Looking For 

You can work autonomously and take ownership. We thrive with space and responsibility to solve problems.

You are ambitious, with a will to create something to make a difference.

You approach work in a passionate yet efficient way - we are here to get things done!

And you share our mission to improve people’s physical, mental and financial wellbeing.

SALARY £700 PD
